duties_responsibilities.duty:
Order credit, collect 
& review documents for compliance.
Analyze applicant’s credit status & recommend alternatives when the analysis fails.
Prepare all closing documents accurately pursuant to company and regulatory guidelines.
Ensures timely loan closing and funding activities.
Analyze all loan  information, including, however not limited to credit reports, appraisal reports, title reports, tax returns, financial statements, income, and asset documentation.
Prepare financing proposals consistent with approval for presentation to the applicant.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Banking, Business or an equivalent field (Master's preferred)
